Station Update - Sydenham

A new Metro concourse is being constructed on the northern end of Sydenham Station. 
While the concourse is being installed, please use the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. 
If you need help, please ask staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info
https://transportnsw.info/alerts#/train
Station Update - Central

There are changes happening at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works. Access to certain areas of the station and platforms may mean using different stairs, escalators and lifts. Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff. For detailed information please visit https://transportnsw.info/alerts/details#/6063489

Hawkesbury Rd bus stop closures and diversions

From 8pm Friday 5 June, Hawkesbury Rd, Westmead will be one-way in a southbound direction between Darcy Rd and Hainsworth St. The following stops will be permanently closed:

∙ The Westmead Institute Hawkesbury Rd (214516)
∙ Westmead Hospital Hawkesbury Rd (214517)

The alternative stops are Westmead Children's Hospital Hawkesbury Rd (214515) or Darcy Rd after Hawkesbury Rd (214518).

Temporary changes to overnight light rail services between Central and The Star

As a result of the latest directives from the Australian Government around public gatherings, the L1 Dulwich Hill overnight light rail services operating from 11pm (midnight on Friday) to 6am between Central Grand Concourse and The Star are suspended in both directions.

These temporary service changes are in place until further notice.

Use Trip Planner for alternative transport.

The Crescent, Annandale temporary bus stop closure

The westbound bus stop on The Crescent at Johnston St (203816) will be closed from Monday 16 November 2020 until January 2023 for WestConnex Rozelle Interchange works.

Route 433 services towards Balmain Gladstone Park and Major Event Bus route 2 towards Sydney Olympic Park will use the stop on The Crescent at View St (203815) instead.

Check signs for directions to the alternative stop location.

The Star temporary stop closure

From 6am Wednesday 21 July until further notice, L1 Dulwich Hill Line light rail services will not stop at The Star while the whole casino complex is closed under NSW Government COVID-19 guidelines. 

No other stops are affected. 

Please use the alternative nearest stops: Pyrmont Bay or John Street Square (approx. 5 minute walk). 

All Sydney Light Rail services continue to run at current reduced frequencies. L1 line night services from 11pm to 6am continue to be suspended between Central and The Star. 

Please allow extra travel time and use the Trip Planner or check travel alerts to see if your travel is affected.
